name: The Unstable Ground
description:
THE UNSTABLE GROUND

There is only one ground you can stay on. Use your mouse to move the ground. Use  LEFT and RIGHT clicks on your mouse to slow down time, to make precise jumps.

Controls (These are thought in game but...)

WASD =  Move

Left click  = Slow down the by a little

Right click  = Slow down the by a lot

Middle click = Start level

Mouse Movement = To move the block.

Made for GMTK GJ 2019, theme : Only One
